title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Master fundamental AI concepts and develop practical machine learning skills. Learn supervised learning, neural networks, and best practices for ML development.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Build and train deep neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and more. Learn to apply deep learning to real-world problems.

title: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
description: Learn to use NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly, Scikit-Learn, and TensorFlow for data analysis and machine learning.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Master essential data structures and algorithms. Learn to analyze complexity and solve computational problems efficiently.

title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Build complete web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React, and MongoDB.

title: Natural Language Processing Specialization
description: Learn NLP techniques including sentiment analysis, machine translation, and question answering using deep learning.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: Learn SQL to extract and analyze data from databases. Master joins, aggregations, and subqueries.

title: Computer Vision Fundamentals
description: Learn image processing, object detection, and image classification using deep learning and OpenCV.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
description: Master AWS services and architecture. Prepare for the AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification.

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Learn AI fundamentals including search algorithms, game playing, machine learning, and neural networks.

title: React - The Complete Guide
description: Master React including Hooks, Redux, React Router, Next.js. Build modern, reactive user interfaces.

title: Data Engineering on Google Cloud
description: Learn to design and build data processing systems on Google Cloud Platform. Master BigQuery, Dataflow, and more.

title: Python Programming Masterclass
description: Comprehensive Python course from basics to advanced. Learn OOP, file I/O, databases, and web scraping.

title: DevOps Engineering and CI/CD
description: Master DevOps practices, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and CI/CD pipelines for modern software development.

title: Statistical Learning and Data Mining
description: Learn statistical methods for data analysis including regression, classification, and clustering techniques.

title: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Technologies
description: Understand blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized applications. Learn Bitcoin and Ethereum.

title: iOS App Development with Swift
description: Build iOS applications using Swift and Xcode. Learn UI design, networking, and Core Data.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn security principles, cryptography, network security, and ethical hacking fundamentals.

title: Advanced Python Programming
description: Master advanced Python concepts including decorators, generators, context managers, and concurrent programming.

title: Big Data Analysis with Spark
description: Learn to process large-scale datasets using Apache Spark, PySpark, and distributed computing.

title: Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Create impactful data visualizations and dashboards using Tableau. Learn storytelling with data.

title: Android App Development Masterclass
description: Build Android apps using Kotlin and Java. Learn Android Studio, Material Design, and app architecture.

title: Reinforcement Learning Specialization
description: Learn RL algorithms, Q-learning, policy gradients, and deep reinforcement learning for AI agents.

title: UI/UX Design Bootcamp
description: Master user interface and user experience design. Learn Figma, user research, and design thinking.

title: Time Series Analysis and Forecasting
description: Learn to analyze and forecast time series data using ARIMA, Prophet, and deep learning methods.

title: Microservices Architecture
description: Design and build scalable microservices using Spring Boot, Docker, and Kubernetes.

title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
description: Master algorithms and data structures using JavaScript. Prepare for technical interviews.

title: Generative AI and Large Language Models
description: Learn about GPT, BERT, and other LLMs. Understand prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques.

title: Business Analytics and Intelligence
description: Learn business analytics, KPIs, A/B testing, and data-driven decision making for business growth.

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Create 2D and 3D games using Unity and C#. Learn game physics, AI, and multiplayer networking.
